dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
April 9, 2007 
To whom it may concern, 

I work at Seancody.com It was brought to our attention that few of your members have downloaded our images and are promoting them on your site. This is completely 
unacceptable. I am pretty sure that you are not aware of this, however, we need to figure out a way so that you know which ones are our images and that they are taken down IMMEDIATELY. All images under the name Sean Cody should be taken down 
immediately, I do not want to escalate this situation and to get our at attorneys involved. Your cooperation in this matter is greatly appreciated. 

We have all rights to ALL Seancody images. No one other than us (Cody Media) is allowed to copy, distribute and profit from these videos. 

Not only is it illegal for your firm to post adult content without the 2257 information, you
